videos.name: A Tale of Two Mothers
videos.description: When Dalya and Shiri 'randomly' bump into each other at a concert they could never imagine how deeply connected they really are.

videos.name: Starting Over
videos.description: Even when a Sefer Torah falls, there’s reason and hope to start over. A true story with an inspiring lesson.

videos.name: The Side Door
videos.description: A heartwarming story reminding us that it's never too late, there's always the side door!

videos.name: Saved By Shmitah
videos.description:
13 Hamas terrorists never expected that their plans to attack and kill Jews would be exposed & ruined by the mitzvah of Shmitah. Watch to find out how Hashem’s promise to bless those who keep the mitzvah unfolded near the Gaza border just seven years ago.

Brought to you by Keren Hashviis

To partner with a farmer visit:  
https: www.kerenhashviis.org

videos.name: Meet Mr. Appelbaum
videos.description: When Mr. Appelbaum's life was miraculously saved during a bombing of World Was 2, he made a commitment that he still keeps 75 years later!

videos.name: Little Giant Man
videos.description: A few simple and sincere kind words to a gas attendant leaves an indelible impression years later.

videos.name: FORGIVEN
videos.description: A Story from the 2021 Tisha b'Av Film The Wait

videos.name: A Buried Memory
videos.description: When Rabbi Steven Amman was left  burying a stranger he decides to dig up the past. What he uncovers is nothing short of unbelievable.

videos.name: The Name Heard Round the World
videos.description:
For more videos and stories from Rabbi Yoel Gold visit http://www.InspireClips.com
Sponsored by: Gesher 
Please visit: http://www.unityprize.org/
Produced by: Moshe Bree

videos.name: A Heartfelt Blessing
videos.description: Mr. Zilber’s story reminds us that we each have the power to bring blessing into someone else’s life by simply wishing them well from our hearts.

videos.name: Givers Keepers
videos.description: Powerful story reminding us what we give away is what we keep forever.

videos.name: Praying for Barak
videos.description: Watch this amazing story of how a prayer touched a heart across the world.

videos.name: Bring On The Blessing
videos.description: A Story of Commitment, Faith and Unexpected Reward will Inspire You to Bring Blessing into Your Own Life through the Power of Bentching.

videos.name: Signed At Sinai
videos.description: When Alex Shafir was called to do a random act of kindness he discovers he was repaying a debt 30 years later!

videos.name: Shabbat Is Shabbat
videos.description: Powerful story how Shabbos saved two brothers from bankruptcy and certain death.

videos.name: One Minute Late
videos.description: Coming late on my first day of the job taught me the lesson of a lifetime.

videos.name: One In Ten Million
videos.description: A commitment to saying Amen saves Freddie Bettesh's life twice and helps him find in his soulmate.

videos.name: A Second Chance
videos.description: Everyone can use a second chance. This moving story and heartfelt song will empower you to try again!

videos.name: The Angel from Westchester
videos.description: Angels come in different shapes and forms. For an aspiring convert, it was Chaim Grossman, a holocaust survivor who danced with him.

videos.name: A Place to Call Home
videos.description: A forgotten sefer torah, an abandoned aron kodesh, and a young girl all find the same home through divine providence, prayer and a generous heart.

videos.name: It's Snow Coincidence
videos.description: A cancelled venue and a raging snow storm send Duvi a wonderful sign from above.

videos.name: A Dream Come True
videos.description: In an Israeli cemetery where parents bury children, a group of American high school students prove that family is forever.

videos.name: Letting Go
videos.description: In the turbulence of World War II, his family had one ticket to life. Then his best friend betrayed him. Years later, they met again.

videos.name: Saved by Accident
videos.description: When Joel got his friend Yechiel in trouble they never imagined that it would end up saving his life years later.

videos.name: In a Heartbeat
videos.description: When Mordechai Sultan woke up with chest pains, why was Hatzolah at his door in less than 30 seconds carrying all the specialized equipment that saved his life?!

videos.name: A Tale of Two Fathers
videos.description: Bonded by Tragedy & Faith.

videos.name: The Babysitters Message
videos.description: A young 14 year old babysitter's message to a seven years old child ends up saving his life many years later.

videos.description: Stranded  Barefoot She Was Given The Gift of Shoes

faq_list.question: If you have a filtered internet connection or device,
faq_list.answer:
it's important to be aware of how filters can impact your browsing experience on Hashkifa.com. Here's what you need to know:

Filters, by their nature, are designed to restrict certain types of traffic, and sometimes they can unintentionally block legitimate traffic, including your ability to make purchases or enjoy a seamless viewing experience on our website. Unfortunately, there is little we can do from our end to resolve this issue directly.

Our website relies on several necessary domains to function properly. If your device or network filter is blocking any of these domains, it may cause disruptions in your ability to purchase, log in, or watch videos on our platform. In such cases, we recommend contacting your filter company's support team.

Here's what you can do:

  1. Contact Your Filter Company: Get in touch with your filter company's customer support and explain the situation. Ask them to investigate any potential blockages that may be hindering your experience on our website. Request that they whitelist any domains or connections related to Hashkifa.com to ensure uninterrupted access.
  2. List of Essential Domains: We have compiled a list of domains crucial for uninterrupted access to our website. If any of these domains are blocked, you will likely encounter issues with purchasing, logging in, and watching videos. Please consult our list and ensure that these domains are allowed by your filter:

List of Essential Domains:

  • hashkifa.com
  • app.hashkifa.com
  • thumbs.hashkifa.com
  • www.gstatic.com
  • player.vimeo.com
  • i.vimeocdn.com
  • f.vimeocdn.com
  • 137vod-adaptive.akamaized.net

faq_list.question: Can I share my login info. with family and friends?
faq_list.answer:
Only a person or family in the same household may login into an account to watch the film/s they purchased.

Hashkifa reserves the right to deactivate any account that’s being shared with extended family and friends who have not purchased the film.

Please note the option on the purchase page “Purchase For A Friend” to surprise a loved one with the gift of a Hashkifa film.

faq_list.question: Can I use maaser money to pay for film?
faq_list.answer:
Hashkifa is a non-profit organization that is focused on producing cutting edge content in an engaging manner to uplift the hearts of Am Yisroel.

Please communicate this information to your Rabbi or Rov for Halachic guidance.

faq_list.question: Is there a limit to how many times I can login or watch the film?
faq_list.answer: You can view the film/s you’ve purchased as many times as you want.

faq_list.question: If I purchased the family package, can someone who’s staying over watch with us?
faq_list.answer: Hashkifa allows for guests who have been staying in the same household to watch the film/s with the family.

faq_list.question: Can I download or buy the films to watch without internet access?
faq_list.answer: Hashkifa films can only be streamed directly from the Hashkifa website.

faq_list.question: I forgot my password, how do I reset it to login?
faq_list.answer: On the sign in page, click on the words “Forgot your password?” for the prompts to reset your password

faq_list.question: I purchased films in the past, and I can’t log in to access my account.
faq_list.answer: Due to the upgrades to our site, you may be experiencing difficulty logging in with an old password. Please use the "Reset Password" page to regain access to your account.

faq_list.question: Purchasing For A Friend
faq_list.answer:
If you would like to surprise someone with a video gift, we've made the process easy for you. During the checkout process, simply follow these steps:

Click on the tab labeled "Purchase For A Friend."

Fill out the recipient's name, email address, and include a personal message that you would like them to see. It's important to enter the correct email address to ensure they receive the gift message and login information without any issues.

Please note that gifting a video works regardless of whether the recipient has an account with our website or not. In either case, they will be guided through the following steps:

If the recipient has an existing account, they will be prompted to log in using their credentials.

If the recipient does not have an account, they will be asked to create a new login by providing their email address and setting a password.

In the event that the recipient has forgotten their login credentials, they can easily proceed with the password reset process by clicking on the "Forgot Password" option.

faq_list.question: Receiving a Gift from Someone
faq_list.answer:
When someone sends you a gift, we want to make sure you have a smooth experience accessing it. Here's how it works:

  1. Email Notification: You will receive an email notification informing you about the gift. This email will include a direct link to access the video.
  2. Existing Account:
    • If you already have an account with us, click on the provided link, and you will be prompted to log in using your previous account login information.
    • In case you have forgotten your password, click on the "Forgot Password" option to initiate the password reset process. Please ensure that the email address you use for the password reset is the same as the one to which the gift was sent.
  3. New Account:
    • If you have never had an account with us before, use the link provided in the email to set your password. This will allow you to proceed with logging in to your new account and accessing the gift.
    • If you encounter any difficulties during the process or have any questions, our dedicated customer support team is here to assist you. Simply reach out to us, and we'll be happy to help.

We hope you enjoy your gift and have a wonderful experience on Hashkifa.com!

faq_list.question: If you are encountering difficulties while trying to complete the checkout process,
faq_list.answer:
we understand that it can be frustrating. Here are some steps to troubleshoot the issue:

  1. Error Message: Check if there is a red error message displayed next to the "Pay" button. This message may provide specific information regarding the problem you are facing. Take note of the error message for further assistance.
  2. Filter Restrictions: If you have a filter installed, it is possible that it is blocking some necessary background connections required for the checkout process. In such cases, we recommend reaching out to your filter company's support team. They can often identify the blockage and assist in allowing the necessary connections to proceed.
  3. Payment Information: Double-check the accuracy of the card information you entered, including the card number, expiration date, and CVC code. Even a minor mistake in these details can prevent a successful payment. Verify that the information is correct and try again.
  4. Alternative Device: If the issue persists, you may want to try completing the checkout process from a different device. Sometimes, technical issues can be device-specific. Switching to another device can help determine if the problem lies with your current device.
  5. Seek Support: If none of the above steps resolve the issue, click on the "Need Help?" button located on the right side of the screen. Fill out the support request form, providing as much detail as possible about the problem you are experiencing. Our support team will make every effort to assist you promptly. Please note that during peak periods, such as T'Baav, there might be a larger backlog of requests, which may result in a longer response time. Therefore, it is essential to rule out any potential issues with your filter, device, or other factors.

faq_list.question: What if I purchased the Family Package?
faq_list.answer:
With the Family Package, only individuals or a family residing in the same household are allowed to log into an account and watch the films they purchased. It is important to note that sharing the account with extended family and friends who have not purchased the film is not permitted. Hashkifa reserves the right to deactivate any account found to be in violation of this policy.

 

Please keep in mind that if you would like to share the gift of a Hashkifa film with a loved one, we offer the option to "Purchase For A Friend" on the purchase page. This allows you to surprise someone special with the gift of a Hashkifa film in a separate and authorized manner.

faq_list.question: What if I have an old account, can I login and watch films I purchased previously?
faq_list.answer: If you have an old account, you should be able to log in and access the films you have purchased in the past, unless they have already expired from your account. Please note that the availability of purchased films may be subject to certain limitations or expiration dates, so it's important to check the status of your account and the specific terms related to your previous purchases. If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
